text: Sergei Vasilyevich Vinogradov (; born 19 August 1971) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Energiya Volzhsky players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Rotor Volgograd players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Mordovia Saransk players Category:FC Olimpia Volgograd players Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Association football defenders
title: Sergei Vinogradov (footballer, born 1971)
